name: ccat2s1cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), cword(c1)))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)))

comment: The concatenation of two singleton words is a word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Sep-2018.)
